name: Lost Inferno
description:
Lost Inferno

Can you find the ascendent and survive the island? Will the harsh winds and stifling air consume you, or will you survive to live another day?

Created in 72 hours for Heart Game Jam.

Credits:

  • Created in Godot 3.0.2
  • Textures from CC0 Textures
  • Blendswap basemesh used as a sculpting template for ascendent
  • OpenDyslexic and Origami_Mommy fonts
  • All other assets (sounds, programming, and 3D models) were created by me (TwistedTwigleg)

Go check out all of the other entries for the jam!
